#summary Baidu C/C++ Hooking Framework Demos.

Demos shows:
  * *System*
    * disk
    * memory
    * net
    * other
  * *Program* shows a variety of hook method for the program
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/program/simple/hook.cpp Simple] hooks simple method through shared library
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/program/library/attachlib.cpp Library] hooks static library method by using API. 
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/program/api/api.cpp API] hooks system method *fread* and program method *func* 
  * *Unittest* shows use API with google test.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/unittest/simple/test_attach.cpp Simple] hooks simple method.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/unittest/class/test_class.cpp Class] hooks class public/private method.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/unittest/sharedlibrary/test_so.cpp SharedLibrary] hooks shared-library method.
